name: Girl who never left (her apartment)
description:
You wake up in an empty apartment, with nothing but a journal. Who was here?

NOTE: Assets and textures will continue to be upgraded!

Controls
  • Pick up journal: [E]
  • Next page / previous page: [Left mouse] / [Right mouse]
  • Toggle hide/view journal: [tab]
  • Pick up page: [E]  
    • (Need to have acquired journal)
  • Quit game (there is NO save! All progress will be lost!): [alt] + [F4]
Team

Oskar aka acronaut (floater) - Apartment assets

Quilly - Gameplay programming, narrative
